headline: Show HN: Top Quant/Algotrading Githubs Automated
description:
With a seed project defining the audience, determines their most popular Githubs.

Interesting results! [1]

One journalist was surprised [2] on the Quant and Algotrading results.

Github's Rest API [3] is actually quite complex - and has undocumented hurdles. E.g. when there's more than 40K stars the API caps it there - unless you use the GraphQL API... [4]

There's a lot more meat on the Github bones. Stay tuned.

[1] https://profitview.net/blog/open-source-trading-projects

[2] https://www.efinancialcareers.com/news/2022/07/coding-langua...

[3] https://docs.github.com/en/rest

[4] https://docs.github.com/en/graphql
